dict.string: Mod(s) that were not equipped were converted to Mod Enhance Kits.
Selected Mod(s) will be equipped. Continue?

<font color = "red">Equipped Mod(s) will be changed.</font>
Unselected Mod(s) will be converted to materials.
Continue?

Equipped Mod(s) will not be changed. You will be returned to the previous screen.
Continue?

Cannot select any more.
Selected Mod(s) can be unselected by tapping again.

About <font color='yellow'>Equip Mods </font> Equip units with Mods to to strengthen their power.
Here you can equip Mods acquired by <font color='yellow'>other than clearing quests.</font>
Choose the unit you want to equip with Mods.
Choose the Mods you want to equip.

Mod selected! You can also select more than one Mod to equip!
Select<font color='yellow'> all Mods that you want to equip. </font>

Now you can challenge the Equip Mods tutorial quest. Try to challenge?
If you skip the tutorial, the units available in the tutorial will be sent directly to the folder.
